content:
Hello, where can we ask questions about the number game? I am stuck:
Goal:
succ a + 0 = succ (a + 0)
typing rw [add_zero] does nothing
Screenshot-2024-05-27-at-10.24.41.png
Try clicking the "retry" button next to the thing that failed
Attila Vajda has marked this topic as resolved.

Ideally one should not end up in this situation. While I know that it's still possible to get to that state, @Attila Vajda do you remember which actions lead you to this state? Was it entering stuff in "Editor Mode" (button top-right) or maybe reloading the page with an error already present? or something else?

Opened https://github.com/leanprover-community/lean4game/issues/233 to remind myself to fix this.
